name: A horrible Ludum Dare 48 Submission
description:
A game that was originally made for the Ludum Dare 48 Game jam, but i ended up planning wrongly by a lota nd not having time to properly finish it, so it's just a horrible game about how horrible the game is and what it was suppose to be.

Source code: (it's bad.): https://github.com/Offlical/horrible-ldjam-48
